projects.name: Ezra Alexander's Portfolio
projects.desc: I utilized React and SCSS to create an art portfolio for my close friend and former classmate, Ezra. I employed SCSS to craft a responsive and minimalist design, while React handled basic functionality such as mapping and filtering items.

projects.name: The Unique Bean
projects.desc: I created the user interface (UI) for a fictional coffee shop, leveraging React for JavaScript functionality such as mapping, filtering items, and importing JSON elements. To manage the shopping cart, I employed Redux Toolkit. Additionally, I utilized SCSS to craft a responsive and visually appealing interface.

projects.name: The Balloon Gallery
projects.desc: I built the frontend for a fictional party coordinating service using React and CSS. I utilized React for functionality and reusable components, while CSS was employed to ensure that the app is responsive and visually appealing.

projects.name: Headphones & Earbuds
projects.desc: I developed a user interface (UI) for a fictional headphones and earbuds shop, employing vanilla JavaScript for functionality such as filtering, mapping items, and cart management. Additionally, I utilized SCSS for an attractive and responsive design.
